text: The Happy Cricket is a 2001 animated children's fantasy movie. The movie was directed by Walbercy Riabs. It was released on 20 July 2001. ==Cast== ===English version=== *Sam Riegel - Christopher The Happy Cricket *Bob Papenbrook - Wartlord *Cindy Robinson - Honeydew / Spidora *Peter Doyle - Magic Toucan / Soldier 1 *Robert Buchholz - Barnaby / Sergeant *Dave Mallow - Buffuno *Steve Staley - Leonardo *Neil Kaplan - Toad 1 *Dan Woren - Toad 2 ===Original version=== *Vagner Fagundes - Grilo *Araken Saldanha - Maledeto *Régis Monteiro - Faz Tudo *Fátima Noya - Bituquinho *Letícia Quinto - Juliana *Nelson Machada - Sapo 1 *Renato Master - Sapo 2 *Antonio Moreno - Sapo 3 *Camila Bullara - Pouco Grilo *Jorge Barcellas - Caracol velho / Geral *Emerson Caperbat - Pai *José Soaresmaya - Tucano *Isaura Cames - Saranha *Rita de Almieda - Caracolino *Marli Bortoletto - Bacaninha *Rodrigo andreato - Rafael *Ursula Bezzaba - Moreninha *Tatiana de S. Parra - Linda Estrela Da Noite (singing voice) ==Other websites== * Official franchise site * Category:2001 animated movies Category:2001 adventure movies Category:2000s musical movies Category:2000s family movies Category:2001 fantasy movies Category:Brazilian movies
title: The Happy Cricket
